message: Trey Gowdy would be perfect. Lets get behind the movement by contacting or Congressmen or women.

Otis.....you need to do some SERIOUS, in depth study of the Bible. The Biblical authors wouldn't have had a clue about same sex marriages, so no it doesn't condemn it. The Bible has some things to say about homosexuality, but they were about degrading a human being, prostitution, which was viewed as degrading a person, giving into purely lustful desires which was considered degrading of one's self. My truth and your truth are obviously different. In America we have separation of church and state for a very important reason.....that we don't become a theocracy. You are FREE to practice your religion how you see fit in your daily life, in your home, and in your place of worship. You DO NOT have the right to discriminate against anyone if you have a business license with the state.
